description:
While dejected that the fans are unresponsive to her efforts, understudy Yui informs Boss Inugane that another talent agency has recruited her.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Rosenhenkou / My Angel / Sasuga Desu!! / Ai Sansan to.. / Ai Sanran to / Yasashisa ni Kurumarete / Shuzai
路線変更 / My Angel / さすがです!! / 愛惨々と.. / 愛燦爛と / やさしさに包まれて / 取材
